info.+content: Taiju is about to confess to the girl he loves when a mysterious force hits the Earth and turns every human into stone. Taiju and his friend Senku wake up thousands of years later and begin to rebuild society. (from manga)
"Trash is a Treasure" by Laura Pitt-Pulford (ep 17)
